init.title: Oura Ring Options
init.description: Configure how often Oura Ring data is fetched and how many days of historical data to load on first setup.

data.historical_days: Historical days to load (1-90, only applies on first setup)

data_description.update_interval: How often to fetch new data from Oura API (1-60 minutes)
data_description.historical_days: Number of days of historical data to import as statistics when first adding the integration (1-90 days)
